data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Delta, Nigeria.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Delta, Nigeria
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Delta to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Delta that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Father, help the 1,074,344 believers in Delta to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Iku people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Iku people know you.
Spirit, sanctify the 1,074,344 believers in Delta and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Delta, Nigeria so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Delta, Nigeria. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

location.name: Delta
location.people_groups_list: Koro Nulu, Ahan, Ukwa, Kamo, Zeem
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Koro Nulu (4,000), Ahan (500), Ukwa (600), Kamo (40,000), Zeem (600)
